report.title: Explore records using standard filters - mapping
report.description: Report designed for mapping the explore records facility in iRecord, with standardised filtering parameters.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o LEFT JOIN (occurrence_associations oa JOIN cache_termlists_terms assoctype on assoctype.id=oa.association_type_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms assocpart on assocpart.id=oa.part_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms assoccond on assoccond.id=oa.condition_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms assocpos on assocpos.id=oa.position_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms associmpact on associmpact.id=oa.impact_id ) on (oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id or oa.to_occurrence_id=o.id) and oa.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences oassoc on (oassoc.id=oa.to_occurrence_id and oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id) or (oassoc.id=oa.from_occurrence_id and oa.to_occurrence_id=o.id) JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id and w.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

column.name: source
column.sql: w.title || ' | ' || case when substring(o.survey_title from 1 for length(w.title)) = w.title then trim(substring(o.survey_title from length(w.title)+1)) else o.survey_title end

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.recorders)>30 THEN 'Recorder' ELSE o.recorders END

column.name: association_detail
column.sql: case when oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id then o.preferred_taxon else oassoc.preferred_taxon end || ' ' || assoctype.term || ' ' || case when oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id then oassoc.preferred_taxon else o.preferred_taxon end || coalesce(' ' || assocpos.term, '') || coalesce(' ' || assocpart.term, '') || coalesce(' (condition ' || assoccond.term || ')', '') || coalesce(' resulting in ' || associmpact.term, '')

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when o.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else o.input_form end
